title: Can I use my phone as a USB flash drive?
answer:
Yes. You can connect your phone to a computer using a USB cable to view content in the microSD card and phone storage. 

 Choose a connection method: 

 Media device (MTP): MTP stands for Media Transfer Protocol. In this mode, you can synchronize media files between your phone and a computer that supports MTP. 

 Camera (PTP): PTP stands for Picture Transfer Protocol. In this mode, you can synchronize pictures between your phone and a computer, no matter whether the computer supports MTP or not. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111157)

 When your phone is connected to a Mac, you can manage files on your phone using MTP, but the dial-up connection function on the Mac is unavailable. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111158)
